item.title: 巴西联邦警察指控前总统博尔索纳罗参与犯罪团伙并伪造自己的 COVID-19 疫苗接种数据，这是对这位陷入困境的极右翼领导人的首次起诉。
item.description:

item.title: 纽约州主计长周二报告称，由于华尔街增加了雇员，并对薪酬采取了 "更加谨慎的态度"，去年华尔街的平均奖金略有下降，降至 17.65 万美元。

item.title: 10 天来，纳什维尔警方一直在寻找大学生莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain），他在与密苏里大学兄弟会的兄弟们一起外出后失踪：
item.description:
For 10 days, Nashville police have been searching for college student Riley Strain, who went missing after a night out with his University of Missouri fraternity brothers.

Here's a timeline of how the case has unfolded: https://t.co/7u7MRCtJNm

item.title: 在反对禁用 TikTok 的理由中，一些批评者指出，据称该应用在中国的版本比较温和，这表明母公司字节跳动在美国推出了一款更强大的产品，以吸引消费者并吸走他们的数据。
item.description:
In making their case against a TikTok ban, some critics point to an allegedly tamer version of the app in China, suggesting that parent company ByteDance unleashed a more potent product in the U.S. to hook consumers and vacuum up their data. https://t.co/mE7wYTGzzR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 哥斯拉在东京街头肆意践踏，令围观者惊心动魄，因为这只怪兽参加了一项旨在促进交通安全的活动。
item.description:
Godzilla stomped through the streets of Tokyo, thrilling onlookers as the monster took part in an event to promote traffic safety.

Better known for laying waste to the Japanese capital, a person in a Godzilla costume was appointed honorary police chief for a day. pic.twitter.com/EtMO2eNrOb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在这一天：1995 年，迈克尔-乔丹在休战 21 个月之后，重返职业篮球赛场，加盟他的前球队芝加哥公牛队。除了他和公牛队已经赢得的三个总冠军之外，他还赢得了另外三个 NBA 总冠军。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1995, after a 21-month hiatus, Michael Jordan returned to professional basketball with his former team, the Chicago Bulls.

He would go on to win three more NBA championships to go with the three he and the Bulls had already won. https://t.co/vWMlzfqaFI pic.twitter.com/g5dHjwNfnG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国前总统巴拉克-奥巴马周一离开唐宁街 10 号，没有说明此次突然造访英国首相官邸的原因。
item.description:
Former President Barack Obama departed 10 Downing Street on Monday.
No reason has been given for the unannounced visit to the British Prime Minister's residence. pic.twitter.com/wypis9yrwS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：香港立法者周二通过了一项新的国家安全法，赋予政府更多镇压异议人士的权力，这被广泛认为是2019年亲民主抗议活动引发的全面政治镇压的最新一步。
item.description:
JUST IN: Hong Kong lawmakers passed a new national security law on Tuesday that grants the government more power to quash dissent, widely seen as the latest step in a sweeping political crackdown that was triggered by pro-democracy protests in 2019. https://t.co/bGAhNxQnmz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 塔卢拉-威利斯（Tallulah Willis）首次公开自己成年后被诊断患有自闭症。这位布鲁斯-威利斯（Bruce Willis）和黛米-摩尔（Demi Moore）的女儿现年 30 岁，她在社交媒体上透露了自己的诊断结果。
item.description:
Tallulah Willis is opening up for the first time about being diagnosed with autism as an adult. The 30-year-old daughter of Bruce Willis and Demi Moore revealed the diagnosis on social media. https://t.co/7JM5TazRkT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在当地新闻媒体《高谭主义者》（The Gothamist）报道了史坦顿岛一所学校发现数百本新书被扔进垃圾桶的事件后，纽约市教育官员对这一说法进行了调查，其中许多是关于有色人种和男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者身份的新书。
item.description:
NYC education officials investigating claims that hundreds of new books — many that were about people of color and LGBTQ identities — were thrown in the trash at a Staten Island school after local news outlet The Gothamist reported the discovery. https://t.co/ml82cDooyD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 阿波罗10号的指挥官、宇航员托马斯-斯塔福德（Thomas P. Stafford）周一去世，享年93岁。斯塔福德曾指挥过 1969 年登月和美苏首次太空对接的彩排飞行。
item.description:
Astronaut Thomas P. Stafford, commander of Apollo 10, died Monday at the age of 93. Stafford had commanded a dress rehearsal flight for the 1969 moon landing and the first U.S.-Soviet space linkup. https://t.co/WhZI3qmZec pic.twitter.com/F7BA9xRN8m

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024

item.title: 研究发现，水下扬声器播放来自健康珊瑚礁的声音（如鱼叫声）有助于恢复退化的珊瑚礁。
item.description:
Underwater speakers playing sounds from a healthy reef, such as fish calls, could help restore degraded coral reefs, study finds. https://t.co/3HrFwtg8Wi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 19, 2024
